describe: Barbados is an island country located in the Caribbean region of North America. Known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and historical sites, Barbados offers a unique blend of British colonial history and Caribbean charm.

cities.geographical_location: Located on the southwestern coast of the island, Bridgetown is the capital and largest city of Barbados.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a wet season from June to November and a dry season from December to May.
cities.famous_cuisine: Flying fish and cou-cou, macaroni pie, and pudding and souse.
